languages.text: {g|f:a0df8194db8c4e65ba74defc0da50a76}Defensive Stance{/g} now has a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} instead of −20. These attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

Такие атаки наносят +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.

traits.locale_text: Defensive Stance now has a -10 penalty to Weapon Skill for attacks of opportunity granted by this ability instead of -20. These attacks of opportunity deal an additional +(TGH bonus) damage.

Теперь атаки по возможности при применении Защитной стойки совершаются со штрафом −10, а не −20 к Ближнему Бою. Такие атаки наносят +бонус ВЫН урона дополнительно.

languages.text: 当{g|f:a0df8194db8c4e65ba74defc0da50a76}防御姿态{/g} 这一{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}只会承受−10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，不再是−20减值。防御姿态造成的借机攻击额外造成{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: {g|f:a0df8194db8c4e65ba74defc0da50a76}Defensive Stance{/g} now has a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} instead of −20. These attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当防御姿态这一{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}时，先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}只会承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，不再是-20减值。防御姿态造成的借机攻击还会造成额外伤害，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。

languages.text: Ahora {g|f:a0df8194db8c4e65ba74defc0da50a76}Postura defensiva{/g} aplica una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} para los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} otorgados por esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} (en vez de −20). Estos ataques de oportunidad infligen un {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional de +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

Estos ataques de oportunidad infligen un {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional de +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

languages.text: {g|f:a0df8194db8c4e65ba74defc0da50a76}Defensive Haltung{/g} hat jetzt einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} für {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}, die von dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} gewährt werden (anstatt −20). languages.text: 防御態勢による、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で誘発した{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}への{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}が−20ではなく−10になる。これらの機会攻撃の与{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}増加する。
